welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guasavito, Mexico! This charming city is known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Guasavito has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Birriería Los Chiveros
restaurants.description: Birriería Los Chiveros is a bbq joint located in Guasave.
restaurants.address: Heriberto Valdez Romero (Juventino Rosas), 81020 Guasave, Sinaloa

restaurants.name: Tacos Pancho
restaurants.description: Tacos Pancho is a taco restaurant located in Guasave.

restaurants.name: Nido De Pajaro
restaurants.description: Nido De Pajaro is a asian restaurant located in Guasave.

restaurants.name: Hot Dogs Baldo
restaurants.description: Hot Dogs Baldo is a hot dog joint located in Guasave.

restaurants.name: Mariscos My Chuy
restaurants.description: Mariscos My Chuy is a seafood restaurant located in Guasave.
restaurants.address: Miguel C. Castro SN, 81000 Guasave, Sinaloa
